casebody.data:
In re Complaint of ALLIED ERECTING & DISMANTLING CO., INC.
v.
OHIO EDISON CO. 2014-0008 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 23, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On May 11, 2016, this court stayed the proceedings in this case pending resolution of federal bankruptcy proceedings. Sua sponte, parties ordered to notify this court within 14 days whether the federal bankruptcy proceedings have concluded and this case can proceed.
